attributes.action: Expell the Commons Speaker Michael Martin from his post.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Michael Martin MP does not command the respect of any right minded member of the public.  His behaviour is still that of a shop steward and trade unionist and is not impartial.  Michael Martin's expenses should be investigated as a matter of urgency by an independent commision.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
